creator: klute@apache.org

text:
Dora pointed out that she by mistake entered the wrong version number in the
"Version" field. I changed it to "2.0FINAL" even though she uses 2.5 - which is
not available in the bugzilla menu.

Okay, so the bug is open for you HSSF guys again. Sorry for the confusion!
creator: klute@apache.org
